q: Microsoft Corporate VP Joe Belfiore told reviewers the update would happen`` very, very soon.'' The real backtracking began at CES, however, when Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer said that the first two Windows Phone updates would happen over the next few months. I have been protecting antiquities all my life. I felt if the Cairo museum is robbed, Egypt will never be able to get up again.
